meanings.sent1: The unrefined sugar had a gritty texture.
meanings.sent2: Her unrefined manners often shocked the guests.
meanings.sent3: He tried to impress her with his unrefined dance moves.
meanings.sent4: The unrefined beauty of the untouched forest took her breath away.
meanings.sent5: The unrefined oil left a residue on the pan.

meanings.sent1: His unrefined jokes made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent3: She found his unrefined taste in music amusing.
meanings.sent4: The unrefined language in the play added a raw authenticity.
meanings.sent5: The unrefined furniture clashed with the elegant decor.
